In the new structure, Page will lead product development and technology strategy, while Brin will devote his energies to strategic projects, in particular working on new products . Eric Schmidt will take the role of executive chairman,`` focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership''.
